name: procure-hub
description: ProCure Hub - Professional Procurement Management System
author: Siddharth Vyas

scripts.build: npx esbuild src/renderer/rfq_gen/main.jsx --bundle --outfile=src/renderer/rfq_gen/main.js --format=esm && npx esbuild src/renderer/vendor_quoting/modals/reviewModal.jsx --bundle --outfile=src/renderer/vendor_quoting/modals/reviewModal.js --format=esm && npx esbuild src/renderer/vendor_quoting/components/BoeingFinishModal.jsx --bundle --outfile=src/renderer/vendor_quoting/components/BoeingFinishModal.js --format=esm && npx esbuild src/renderer/vendor_quoting/App.jsx --bundle --outfile=src/renderer/vendor_quoting/App.js --format=esm
